basics.name: Bhushan Patil
basics.label: Tech Lead
basics.summary: 7 years of experience in development, extensively worked on integration of various Open-Source projects/frameworks. Good in troubleshooting and debugging. Have special interest in DevOps, Automation and IoT. Good understanding of Linux operating system & Web protocols.

highlights: Managed Reliability & OpenAPI team.
Acted as contact point between development team & functional team.
Scheduled and tracked development work
Created automated CI/CD pipeline with Jenkins
Developed core modules of EPPM & PACE
Wrote programming specification
Did code review
Took training session on new technologies
Mentored juniors on required technologies
Development
Writing FSD and programming specification
Unit testing

work.summary: Started my first professional developer experience as a Java associate software engineer.
highlights: Development in PACE(Java) & ZK framework according to programming specification
Integration of REST API
Developed generic UI components in ZK
Deployoment on integration & staging server
Bug fixing

projects.name: Reliability on Mobile
projects.description: One of the leading bank wanted to develop mobile app which will have certain reports for middle management. We developed webapplication with responsive UI which can be accessible from any device such Desktop/iPad/mobile.
highlights: Handling the team of 5 developers
Scheduling and tracking work of developers
Gathering client's requirement and distributing tasks to developers
Maintaining project documentation

projects.name: DreamFolio (PoC)
projects.description: One of our client wanted to develop application regarding trading for educational purpose. This application was like a game in which user selects some stocks after opening of market and the one with highest gain for that day, wins the contest
highlights: Designed database schema
Designed the algorithm to generate  scorecard in near real time
Managed the team of 2 junior developers

projects.name: OpenAPI (Wrapper development)
projects.description: One of our client wanted to publish their API to their users and these users were using different language & tools. Hence, we wrote OpenAPI(v3) specification for these API and generated wrappers in Java, Python & C#. Using OpenAPITools, we were able to generate code as well as documentation for these API
highlights: Gave initial training to junior developer on OpenAPI
Designed OpenAPI schema
Setup CI/CD in Jenkins
Managed the team of 5 junior developers

projects.name: Kinetk (PoC)
projects.description: In this project, we integrated USSD service with UPI for Indian market and for Africa market, we integrated USSD with Mojaloop framework. This project intent to make UPI available on feature phone and without internet.
highlights: Designed database schema for the application
Evaluation and RnD of various framework & tools
Setup CI/CD in Jenkins
Managed the team of 3 junior developers

projects.name: iMoveHome
projects.description: This project related to property buying/selling & conveyancing platform in UK. It is micro-services architecture based web project, written in Java using Spring-boot framework. My role in this project is design several component such as messaging service & text search module. Also, I was responsible for making it run on Docker & Kubernetes.
highlights: Dockerized the application and hosted it in Kubernetes cluster
Designed workflow module for conveyancing steps
Developed text search module using PostgreSQL native functionality
Setup CI/CD in Jenkins

projects.name: EPPM
projects.description: The EPPM is an enterprise framework that manages allocation and scheduling of works based on resource competency and resource availability, and is equipped with powerful tools and incisive reports for better management of projects and operations. I lead project for more than one year. Also, I developed calendar and scheduling module in this project
highlights: Wrote many core component such as calendar, scheduling policies & schedule compuation
Designed and developed archival module with Docker
Managed project of 10+ developers.
Setup CI/CD pipeline in Jenkins which does building the code, deployed code on various environment & static code review

projects.name: SPS
projects.description: This project was developed for US client to smoothen their goods delivery system. I was responsible for designing its microservice architecture with Spring cloud(Zuul, Eureka, Config-server) tools. I also developed report module using BIRT tool & oAuth2 integration with AD.
highlights: Designed Micro-services
Designed and generated PDF reports using BIRT
Integrated oAuth2 with single-sign-on
Mentored junior resources on Spring cloud stack
Setup CI/CD pipeline in Jenkins

projects.name: WiKi Migration
projects.description: This project involved migration of legacy data from one wiki solution to another. I developed multi-threaded, fault tolerant api for migration.
highlights: Wrote APIs to fetch raw data from legacy wiki
Converted HTML to markdown using Pandoc
Parallelized execution flow using executor framewrok to speed up migration of millions of records

projects.name: KYC
projects.description: KYC is the mobile application developed for client of Paramatrix. It does varification for number documents such Aadhar, PAN card & driving licence.
highlights: Did basic image processing using OpenCV
Used Tesseract to do OCR on documents
Integrated Aadhar and PAN APIs into application
Wrote REST APIs which were consumed by Mobile App & WebApplication

projects.name: ELK(Log aggregation)
projects.description: Various information security & ISO cerfication requires centralized logging of all critical inhouse application. We used ELK(Elasticsearch, Logstas & Kibana) stack to aggregated all logs and displayed on Kibana
highlights: Parsed many log patterns like log4j logs, syslogs, nginx and apache2
Setup ELK stack on Ubuntu machine
Configured Kibana to show required information in appropriate widgets
Setup nginx reversed proxy for Kibana & added basic auth authentication
Added CRON job to archive ES indecies older than 90 days

projects.name: PACE
projects.description: PACE is the middleware framework developed by Paramatrix. It provides authentication, authorization, audit-trail, CRUD service out-of-box.
highlights: Wrote XA module in PACE for 2phase transcation
Enhanced Redis service for cache & authorization purpose
Added Websocket support
Developed Captcha module
Developed Redis based distributed entity-lock
Distributed logging and tracing using Log4J & Redis
Quartz Job scheduling

projects.name: PACEAdmin
projects.description: PACEadmin is the web console to manage pace framework. It is used to manage users, roles,commands and their mapping.
highlights: Created UI screen in ZK framework
Developed various generic UI component
Integrated APIs of PACE
Bug fixing in PACE framework
